description: Trail has two parts: Swimming pool to Herring CoveRidge-top view. Junction with Tippen Lot near Herring Cove Herring Cove to Point WolfeFern glades, lush forest and coastal views. Steep Sections
directions: Located in Fundy National ParkParking spot can be found at the Fundy National Park pool, Herring Cove trailhead and Point Wolfe
title: Coastal Trail
